suggestions.original: To enhance the transformation dimension, consider incorporating more surreal or unexpected elements. For example, you could add fantastical creatures or objects interacting with the airplane or the children. Additionally, experimenting with different perspectives or abstract forms could further push the boundaries of traditional scenes. Integrating elements from different time periods or cultures might also add a unique twist and deepen the transformative impact of the artwork.
